languages.text: {n}Шумно пыхтящий за вашей спиной Ахиллеас смущенно поводит плечами. Кажется, сейчас он рад черной маске, скрывающей его изуродованное лицо.{/n}
{n}The outburst prompts a self-conscious half-shrug from Achilleas, who is huffing noisily behind you. At this moment, he must be glad his disfigured face is hidden behind the black mask.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Шумно пыхтящий за вашей спиной Ахиллеас смущенно поводит плечами. Кажется, сейчас он рад черной маске, скрывающей его изуродованное лицо.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The outburst prompts a self-conscious half-shrug from Achilleas, who is huffing noisily behind your back. Right now, he must be glad his disfigured face is hidden behind a black mask.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: {n}Dándose por aludido, Achilleas responde al exabrupto encogiéndose de hombros. Lo tienes justo detrás, resoplando ruidosamente; seguro que ahora mismo se alegra de ocultar su rostro desfigurado tras esa máscara negra.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The outburst prompts a self-conscious half-shrug from Achilleas, who is huffing noisily behind you. At this moment, he must be glad his disfigured face is hidden behind the black mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dándose por aludido, Achilleas responde al exabrupto encogiéndose de hombros. Lo tienes justo detrás, resoplando ruidosamente; seguro que ahora mismo se alegra de ocultar su rostro desfigurado tras esa máscara negra.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯在你身后呼哧喘气。听到船员愤怒的怒吼声时，他下意识地耸了耸肩。此时此刻，他肯定十分庆幸，因为他的黑色面具挡住了他那张面目全非的脸。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The outburst prompts a self-conscious half-shrug from Achilleas, who is huffing noisily behind you. At this moment, he must be glad his disfigured face is hidden behind the black mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿吉里亚斯在你身后呼哧喘气。听到船员愤怒的怒吼声时，他下意识地耸了耸肩。此时此刻，他肯定十分庆幸，因为他的黑色面具挡住了他那张面目全非的脸。{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: {n}Cet accès de colère provoque un léger haussement d'épaules de la part d'Achilleas, qui pousse un soupir bruyant derrière vous. Il doit être content que son visage défiguré soit bien caché derrière son masque noir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The outburst prompts a self-conscious half-shrug from Achilleas, who is huffing noisily behind you. At this moment, he must be glad his disfigured face is hidden behind the black mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cet accès de colère provoque un léger haussement d'épaules de la part d'Achilleas, qui pousse un soupir bruyant derrière vous. Il doit être content que son visage défiguré soit bien caché derrière son masque noir.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: {n}その言葉に、あなたの後ろで騒々しく息を吐いていたアキレアスは人目を気にするかのように身をすくめた。この瞬間、彼は己の醜い顔が黒いマスクで隠されていることを喜んでいるに違いない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The outburst prompts a self-conscious half-shrug from Achilleas, who is huffing noisily behind you. At this moment, he must be glad his disfigured face is hidden behind the black mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その言葉に、あなたの後ろで騒々しく息を吐いていたアキレアスは人目を気にするかのように身をすくめた。この瞬間、彼は己の醜い顔が黒いマスクで隠されていることを喜んでいるに違いない。{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: {n}Der Ausbruch entlockt Achilleas ein unsicheres Schulterzucken, der lautstark hinter dir schnaubt. Er ist gewiss gerade froh, dass sein entstelltes Gesicht hinter der schwarzen Maske verborgen liegt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The outburst prompts a self-conscious half-shrug from Achilleas, who is huffing noisily behind you. At this moment, he must be glad his disfigured face is hidden behind the black mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Ausbruch entlockt Achilleas ein unsicheres Schulterzucken, der lautstark hinter dir schnaubt. Er ist gewiss gerade froh, dass sein entstelltes Gesicht hinter der schwarzen Maske verborgen liegt.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack

languages.text: {n}Bu öfke patlaması, arkandan yüksek sesle iç çeken Achilleas'ın mahcupça omuz silkmesine neden oluyor. Biçimsiz suratı siyah bir maskeyle örtülü olduğu için mutlu olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The outburst prompts a self-conscious half-shrug from Achilleas, who is huffing noisily behind you. At this moment, he must be glad his disfigured face is hidden behind the black mask.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Öfke patlamaları, arkanda ağır ağır yüksek sesle nefes alan Achilleas'ın mahcup bir şekilde hafif omuz silkmesine yol açıyor. O anda biçimsiz suratı siyah bir maskeyle kapalı olduğu için mutlu olmalı.{/n}
traits.speaker: CommorraghArenaAchilleasWrack
